DataElement.preferredName: Barthel Index of Activities of Daily Living Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the sum of scores for ten items from the Barthel Index of Activities of Daily Living.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Barthel Index of Activities of Daily Living Total Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A clinical assessment tool designed to measure functional independence and need for assistance in mobility, self-care, and activities of daily living._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
